Reviews.Title: Wrong camera shipped with order
Reviews.Author: Gnat Whim
Reviews.Content: It might have been a good camera, but it wasn't the s4000. People make mistakes, but I got to pay the $15 return postage fee for their error. Personally, it's not worth another $15 gamble to see if they get it right the second time.

ProductInfo.Features:
14-megapixel CCD sensor; 24x wide-angle optical zoom lens, Motion Panorama shooting mode
720p HD movie capture; mini-HDMI output ; Easy upload to Facebook and YouTube
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory cards
14 million effective pixels; 1/2.3 inch CCD sensor; 24x optical zoom lens plus approx 6.7x digital zoom
3.0 inch color TFT LCD monitor plus electronic viewfinder; HD MPEG4 movie 720p with sound
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix S4000 14 MP Digital Camera with Fujinon 30x Super Wide Angle Optical Zoom Accessory Saver 4GB NiMH Battery/Rapid Charger Bundle
